content: *these yoga socks are perfect for any activity where you want some warmth and comfort but don t want to slide around shown in patons kroy socks size 3 25mm u s 3 knitting needles patons yarns * skill level easy materials patons® kroy socks 50 g / 1 75 oz 2 balls of #55612 summer moss jacquard set of four double-pointed knitting needles 3 25 mm u s 3 worked from top down in the round bind off stitches to create opening for the heel finished with cast off in ribbing written directions are provided in pdf download september 2008 *patons free project sheet 99000600153* english *yoga socks to knit * french *chaussettes pour le yoga au tricot * pattern is not available online in french
